title: The Best Arnold Palmer Photos
headline: The Best Arnold Palmer Photos
description: There's only one King, the great Arnold Palmer. Here are our favorite Palmer photos from our archives -- like this 1967 Sports Illustrated shot of The King and his army during the 1967 U.S. Open at Baltusrol.
page_title: Arnold Palmer Photos: The Best of The King
body: There's only one King, the great Arnold Palmer. Here are our favorite Palmer photos from our archives -- like this 1967 Sports Illustrated shot of The King and his army during the 1967 U.S. Open at Baltusrol.
